metadata.title: CVE-2021-47161 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:spi: spi-fsl-dspi: Fix a resource leak in an error handling path'dspi_request_dma()' should be undone by a 'dspi_release_dma()' call in theerror handling path of the probe function, as already done in the removefunction

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
